title: MD
biography: Kiyoshi Nagai was a Japanese structural biologist at the MRC Laboratory of Molecular Biology Cambridge, UK. He was known for his work on the mechanism of RNA splicing and structures of the spliceosome.
aiSummary: Kiyoshi Nagai is a structural biology specialist with an H-index of 58 at MRC Laboratory of Molecular Biology (Member). Has been published in Nature, Trends in Biochemical Sciences, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
